channel.title: Recreation
channel.description:
[center] [b][size=24pt]The Idea[/size][/b] So recently, I've been playing a lot of minecraft, and, if you've never played, one of things you may do is change the textures of all of the blocks. Obviously, this would give the game a new feel. So I've decided to slightly change all of JaGeX's weapons (and hopefully armor and other items), just enough so that you get a new feel of the game. So I've come here to ask for the help of you guys. [b][size=24pt]Your Contribution[/size][/b] If you are interested in making a set (longswords, scimitars, etc.), then just post below what you want to do, and if you would like to recreate the dragon version or not (which would obviously be more complex). Remember, you only need to make one model. Just recolor it seven times and you've got a set. I think starting with weapons would be a good idea, just to see if this works out. Try to keep them under 500 triangles (250 quads). I've also made a simple example model: [IMG]http://i56.tinypic.com/9i65ww.png[/img][/center]
Daggers - Reyx7 (doing dragon) Swords - The Arcanian Long swords - Scimitars - Maces - Hatchets - Battleaxes - War Hammers - Two-handed swords - Spears - Claws - Halberds - Pickaxes -
Also, I know nothing about INTS, but if you put these in a server, wouldn't you just overlap the old model since this would be taking it's place? I'll need an INTS guy, so if you can do that, post below.
Getting even 50% of these would be a decent accomplishment. So if you would like to help out with this project, just put in what you're doing below, and get started!

item.title: Recreation
item.dc:creator: @The_Arcanian The Arcanian
item.description:
@The_Arcanian wrote:

would be great reyx if you could share some contact details, because looks like this topic is dead…
We can do the stuff both.

Read full topic

item.title: Recreation
item.dc:creator: @Java_Is_My_Bitch2 Java Is My Bitch
item.description:
@Java_Is_My_Bitch2 wrote:

[quote=“reyx7, post:6, topic:404459”][quote author=Java Is My Bitch link=topic=501500.msg3669439#msg3669439 date=1310813298]

I can do swords if you like. I just need the color scheme, or is it the same color for every material?

Short sword:

[/quote]Actually in the cache, there’s 1 white model and it gets recolored for rune mith etc. I’m not quite sure how it exactly works though.

But does it fit everything together like these are, or is there a list of requirements?[/quote]I’m not quite sure, as I haven’t looked far enough into it.

Read full topic

item.title: Recreation
item.dc:creator: @reyx7 reyx7
item.description:
@reyx7 wrote:

[quote=“The Wanderer, post:9, topic:404459”]http://img713.imageshack.us/img713/6633/hams.jpg

It’s a bit poly overkill, but I wanted them to look nice. I would really like someone good with PS to make some textures for those babies. Would look awesome.[/quote]
Holy shit those look scary… lol nice job. wireframe?

Read full topic

It’s a bit poly overkill, but I wanted them to look nice. I would really like someone good with PS to make some textures for those babies. Would look awesome.

If anyone is up for it, go right fucking ahead… torag looks the strongest. They added spikes to the hammers >.>

item.title: Recreation
item.dc:creator: @reyx7 reyx7
item.description:
@reyx7 wrote:

gravenfire23:

I would expect you to have to over right the old models with the new ones if you want to use the same item-ids ect. and if you did that you wouldn’t need ints. just a thought

Oh ok cool thanks.

Read full topic
